name: strangulated
content:
strangulated adjective
(BODY PART)
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized If an organ or other part inside the body is strangulated, it has become tightly pressed, blocking the flow of blood or air through it: a strangulated hernia

strangulated adjective
(SOUND)
A strangulated sound is not full or relaxed, but made when your throat is tight, for example because of fear or anger: He let out a strangulated squeak of outrage. Synonym
strangled
